name: Impulsers 2020
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

In a futuristic universe, star in the IMPULSERS show, the most impressive race ever created! Optimize your path and break through obstacles with your mighty sledgehammer to be the fastest.

Platform: PC, Mobile & Tablet
Engine: Unity 3D
Number of players: 1

Producer: Samy-Xavier DELCOURTE
Game Art: Elias RIVET, Hugo SINEAU, Melissa MONTABORD & Thomas JOSSELIN
Game Design: Thibaut BEGUE, Stéphane TRAUT & Simon LIOT
Game Design & Programming: Baptiste FALVET, Maxence DESCHAMPS & Victor CAVAGNAC
Music & Sound Design: Kevin DEDOU

Soundcloud: https://bit.ly/3fh2aWZ
